title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-1.4 - Leases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-1.4 - Leases

State Regulations

No lease agreement will normally be entered into, with
tenancy being on a month-to-month basis. Under special circumstances, however, an authority may enter into a lease agreement with commercial tenants. Approval
by the division is required. The term of such lease must not extend beyond
anticipated demolition date, with the right of the authority to cancel on
30-day notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
